about_the_game:
The warriors of Tenochtitlan rush into battle! Play as the fierce Aztecs – an aggressive civilization that focuses on strong warriors, spies and priests.

Aztec units gather experience and will evolve through combat instead of technology.

Warriors can capture prisoners that can be later sacrificed to obtain blessings or summon a Hero. Priests can heal allied units and curse enemy units, slowing them down and lowering their armour. Spies are invisible and can be used to gather intelligence or take down high profile targets. Fend off enemy archers using your Atlatl and tear down your opponent’s defenses with the invincible Shorn Ones.

• Play as the Aztecs in every Singleplayer and Multiplayer mode.
• Unique Experience, Prisoner Capturing and Sacrifice mechanics.
• 6 unique Challenges.
• 16 buildings, 20 units.
• 2 heroes: Ahuitzotl and Acamapichtli.

The warriors of Tenochtitlan rush into battle! Play as the fierce Aztecs – an aggressive civilization that focuses on strong warriors, spies and priests.

Aztec units gather experience and will evolve through combat instead of technology.

Warriors can capture prisoners that can be later sacrificed to obtain blessings or summon a Hero. Priests can heal allied units and curse enemy units, slowing them down and lowering their armour. Spies are invisible and can be used to gather intelligence or take down high profile targets. Fend off enemy archers using your Atlatl and tear down your opponent’s defenses with the invincible Shorn Ones.

• Play as the Aztecs in every Singleplayer and Multiplayer mode.
• Unique Experience, Prisoner Capturing and Sacrifice mechanics.
• 6 unique Challenges.
• 16 buildings, 20 units.
• 2 heroes: Ahuitzotl and Acamapichtli.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.7ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 3.4ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
